name: Ricey
body: ### Welcome to Ricey. Ricey is a cross-platform system information tool. Itâ€™s perfect for those who love to show off their desktops, or even just a reliable tool for getting system information that you know works on all major platforms. No need to use [WinScreen](https://github.com/RubenRocha/WinScreen) for Windows, [Archey](https://github.com/djmelik/archey) for Linux, etc. Written in C++ with no runtime dependencies makes it light and portable The executable comes out to a small 40kb OSX, and just about 135kb on Windows (for example) ### Binaries You can download some pre-compiled binaries.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
